metrics.title: Code Coverage
metrics.description: Code Coverage: More is better: What percentage of the code is covered by unit tests.

metrics.title: Complexity Per Thousand Lines
metrics.description: Cognitive Complexity: Less is better: How testable and maintainable are the methods in this application?

metrics.title: Bugs
metrics.description: Bugs: Less is better: How many Sonarqube bug code violations were found in this application?

metrics.title: Vulnerabilities
metrics.description: Vulnerabilities: Less is better: How many Sonarqube security vulnerabilities were found in this application?

metrics.title: Criticals Per Thousand Lines
metrics.description: Critical Violations: Less is better: How many Sonarqube critical violations were found per thousand lines of code?

metrics.title: Violations Per Thousand Lines
metrics.description: Violations: Less is better: How many Sonarqube violations were found per thousand lines of code?
